title: Alien Crackdown in Hawaii
body:
A crackdown on the estimated 30,000 to 40,000 illegal aliens in Hawaii has been announced by the United States 
Immigration and Naturalization Service. Harold Ezell, the agency's Commissioner for the Western Region, said 
Tuesday that the new enforcement effort would focus on capturing illegal aliens engaged in criminal activities or 
occupying jobs that could be done by American citizens and legal permanent residents.
China and Soviet Union open net walks aimed at normalizing their relations amid indications that Chinese will press 
Russians to reduce number of Soviet nuclear missiles deployed along China's northern frontier; photo (M)
